title.native: 問題児たちが異世界から来るそうですよ?
title.romaji: Mondaiji-tachi ga Isekai kara Kuru Sou desu yo?
title.english: Problem Children Are Coming From Another World, Aren't They?

description:
Izayoi Sakamaki, Asuka Kudou, and You Kasugabe have tremendous psychic powers and are bored with the regular world. An envelope arrives for each person, and when each opens their envelope, they are stunned to see the scenery around them change to a world they had never encountered before. They've been summoned by the Black Rabbit to help the community "No Name" to overthrow the Devil King.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ตัวป่วนชั้นเซียน มาตบเกรียนถึงต่างโลก

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

node.description:
__Height:__ 158cm

[Twitter](https://x.com/sadoharakaori) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/himekopan/)

Kaori Sadohara is a Japanese voice actress and singer. Her most known role is Haruna Annaka in Nichijou. She is affiliated with the agency Object.

__Height:__ 158cm

[Twitter](https://x.com/sadoharakaori) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/himekopan/)

Kaori Sadohara is a Japanese voice actress and singer. Her most known role is Haruna Annaka in Nichijou. She is affiliated with the agency Object.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yasukiti01)

__Hometown:__ Anjo, Aichi Prefecture, Japan

Yasutaka Yamamoto debuted as a storyboard maker and a producer with episode 34 of Idaten Jump (2005) after working as an assistant producer for My Melody (2005) He then worked as an assistant director for The Orphans of Simitra (2008), and debuted as a director with Valkyria Chronicles the following year. Since then, he has worked on many productions as a director, storyboard maker, and producer. Some of these titles include: Actually, I Am… (2015), Hinomaru Sumo (2018), and Nekopara (2020).

_Source: Crunchyroll Expo 2020_

Kusakawa Keizou is a storyboarder and director working for [Seven Arcs](https://anilist.co/studio/35/Seven-Arcs). During his early years at the studio he has worked under [Shinbou Akiyuki](https://anilist.co/staff/100089/Akiyuki-Shinbou) and has since then been also involved in several shows directed by Shinbou at [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/Shaft). Kusakawa also took over the duties as director of the Lyrical Nanoha series from Shinbou after he left Seven Arcs, starting with its second season, Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha A's

node.description:
[Website](https://www.sarah-bridcutt.com/) | [Profile (EARLY WING)](https://www.earlywing.co.jp/actordb/catef/talent_bridcuttsarahemi) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SarahBridcutt) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sarahsan_0205/) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/sarah-bridbutt.bsky.social)

A half-Australian, half-Japanese voice actress who made her debut in 2012. Her first starring role was [Asuka Kudou](https://anilist.co/character/69437) in _[Mondaiji-tachi ga Isekai kara Kuru Sou Desu yo?](https://anilist.co/anime/15315)_ Since then, she’s appeared in anime, games, and Japanese dubs of western movies. She is perhaps best known for her performances as [Myne](https://anilist.co/character/129808) in _[Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari](https://anilist.co/anime/99263)_ and [Yuzuru Yamai](https://anilist.co/character/86647) in _[Date A Live](https://anilist.co/anime/15583)_.

(Source: Crunchyroll Expo 2020)
Since around 2012, Shingo Tamaki has been actively involved in [diomedéa](https://anilist.co/studio/51/diomeda) productions.
